content.content: I think the UNI team is doing a great job. Still, we are all aware that we must constantly update ourselves. For this reason, I miss in this forum proposals for new products or developments. Any ideas: 1.- UNI portfolio development. UNI Wallet 2.- Development of different interfaces by levels of user knowledge. 3.- Training for community members and users on the different UNI products. 4.- Inclusion of the platform for buying / selling NFTs 5.- Analysis tool of the different tokes of the platform. 6.- Investment strategies. 7.- Support for all languages 8.- … Please let us all continue Thanks and greetings to all
Please refer to UNI Grants. Provides a list of projects that have been given grants. Also shows projects that have been submitted for grants.
